descriptionHtml:
[center][font=Courier New][size=3]
[/size][/font][/center][center][font=Courier New][size=3]We're Officially out of beta!....Although i'm by no means finished! Thank you all for your support!




Hello Please Endorse If you like the mod!
Riverwood Respite Is a very cosy Player home that acts as both a functioning player home and also the Ideal Practical "Respite" for your Dragonborn, the home features many things things that will appeal to just about everybody! ...from a beautiful bathing area to a prison....and much more to come! 

[/size][/font][b][size=4]Location: opposite the Riverwood Wood mill.
[/size][/b][font=Courier New][size=3]
features:
[/size][/font][list]
[*][font=Courier New][size=3]Bathing area[/size][/font]
[*][font=Courier New][size=3]Dungeon (Not shown in screenshots atm)[/size][/font]
[*][font=Courier New][size=3]Alchemy/enchanting area[/size][/font]
[*][font=Courier New][size=3]Crafting area[/size][/font]
[/list][font=Courier New][size=3]
To do: 
[/size][/font][list]
[*][font=Courier New][size=3]Childrens bedrooms[/size][/font]
[*][font=Courier New][size=3]Adjust lighting[/size][/font]
[*][font=Courier New][size=3]Add more clutter/decoration[/size][/font]
[*][font=Courier New][size=3]Add more furnishings to exterior[/size][/font]
[/list][font=Courier New]
[/font][font=Courier New][color=#980000][size=4] [b]Incompatibility[/b][/size][/color][b][color=#980000]
[/color][/b][/font][font=Courier New][b][list=1]
[*][size=3]ETAC (Patch In the works)[/size]
[/list][/b][size=3] [/size]
[size=3]

[/size]Am I still working on this Project?....YES
[size=1](I will alter this when I finish working on this mod)[/size][/font][/center][font=Courier New]
[/font][center][/center]
author: Michaelspicer16
